patient_info: Elevated circulating growth hormone concentration,Increased circulating prolactin concentration,Cafe-au-lait spot,Acne,Abnormal calvaria morphology,Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration,Accelerated skeletal maturation,Fibrous dysplasia of the bones,Premature pubarche,Increased serum testosterone level,Abnormality of the testis size,Thickened cortex of bones
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Growth Hormone Secreting Tumor (GHST)
2. Prolactin-Secreting Tumor (PRLST)
3. McCune-Albright Syndrome (MAS)
4. Fibroblastic Growth Factor Receptor 3 (FGFR3) mutations
5. Gorlin Syndrome (GS)
6. Paget's Disease of the Bone (PDB)
7. Primary Hyperparathyroidism (PHPT)
8. Adrenal Hyperplasia (ADH)
9. Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia (CAH)
10. Skeletal Metabolic Disorders (SMD)

Please note that these diagnoses are based on the provided patient phenotype and should be further evaluated with appropriate clinical tests, imaging, and genetic testing to establish a definitive diagnosis. It is important to consider other less likely conditions as well as comorbidities that may contribute to the observed symptoms. Always consult with a healthcare professional for individualized patient care.
